products.name: SASKIA TRENCH
products.notes: Meet Saskia, our iconic trench coat. Perfectly designed to see you through season after season, year after year, this plum-coloured trench is your Mon-to-Sun style saviour. The classic details - double-breasted buttons, epaulettes, and storm flaps - are contrasted by the subtly feminine fit and flare silhouette, for a coat which is made for the modern woman. Crafted from shower resistant fabric.

products.name: CLARISSE WOOL BLEND COAT
products.notes: Crafted in pure wool, Clarisse is our iconic coat with work-to-weekend appeal.

products.name: LIVIA WOOL COAT
products.notes: Destined for the forefront of your outerwear collection for many years to come, the wool Livia coat displays Hobbs' unwavering commitment to tailored sophistication.

products.name: ELIZE TEXTURED JACKET
products.notes: The perfect cover-up, our Elize jacket is ideal for slipping on over your occasion outfits - whether you're heading to a wedding, the races, or an elegant event

products.name: SASKIA WATER RESISTANT TRENCH COAT
products.notes: Meet Saskia, our iconic trench coat. Exquisitely designed to see you through season after season, year after year, this trench is your Mon-to-Sun style saviour. products.name: FLORENCE COAT
products.notes: Contemporary and chic, the Florence coat is a style staple for a myriad of seasonal occasions and events in your diary.

products.name: PETITE SASKIA TRENCH
products.notes: Meticulously designed to see you through season after season, year after year, our iconic Saskia trench coat is your Monday-to-Sunday sartorial saviour.

products.name: TILDA WOOL COAT
products.notes: Crafted in pure wool, Tilda is our iconic coat with work-to-weekend appeal. Showcasing our tailoring expertise, seam detailing gives it a feminine shape, while a melton undercollar nods to heritage craftsmanship.

products.name: ROMY JACKET
products.notes: Immaculately cut to fit and flatter, the Romy suit jacket will earn its space in your wardrobe for many years to come.

products.name: ELIZE CREPE JACKET
products.notes: The perfect cover-up, our Elize crepe jacket is ideal for slipping on over your occasion outfits - whether you're heading to a wedding, the races or an elegant event.

products.name: BLAIR WOOL BLEND COAT
products.notes: Immaculately cut, your forever wardrobe starts with our softest and iconic Blair coat. Seam detailing creates a feminine shape, while the button-front and flattering neckline showcase the attention to detail Hobbs is known for. We've also added a handy internal ticket pocket to keep your phone and cards accessible. This garment is consciously made from naturally warm and biodegradable brushed wool fabric that's kinder on the planet with a recycled polyester lining to help reduce landfill.

products.name: DANIELLA WOOL JACKET
products.notes: Instant polish. British tweed meets a couture-inspired silhouette in the timeless Daniella jacket.

products.name: MARISSA WOOL COAT
products.notes: Refined in aesthetic and immaculately cut, your forever wardrobe begins with our plum-coloured Marissa coat. Beautiful seam detailing creates a feminine and contemporary shape, while the discreet front buttons and side slip pockets offer practicality of wear. Made from a soft wool fabric.

products.name: PETITE CLARISSE WOOL BLEND COAT
products.notes: Crafted in pure wool the petite Clarisse coat is our iconic outerwear style with work-to-weekend appeal.

products.name: CHARA FIT AND FLARE COAT
products.notes: Boasting a flattering fit and flare shape and made in an exquisite shade of pale pink, your forever wardrobe starts with the Chara coat.

products.name: AIMEE DOUBLE FRONTED TOP
products.notes: Fuss-free style for days on the go. This jersey top is an elegant, effortless option for both your office and off-duty wardrobe. With an easy V-neck and flattering three quarter-length sleeves, the Aimee top comes in a selection of hues. Crafted with a touch of stretch for comfortable wear.

products.name: MISCHA ROLL NECK
products.notes: A Hobbs signature - and for good reason. The fluid Mischa roll neck top is an essential layering piece no wardrobe should be without.

products.name: PIXIE COTTON T-SHIRT
products.notes: You'll find the clue is in the same. Quite simply, the Pixie Cotton T-Shirt will work magic in your wardrobe. Crafted from super-soft cotton and featuring a timeless, comfortable shape, it'll go with everything you own. Easy to wear with jeans, capri trousers and so much more, you'll want one in every colour. Made from 100% pure cotton.

Model is 175cm/5'9'' and is wearing a size UK S

products.notes: Nothing elevates a look quite like a chic pair of courts. This pair features a flattering pointed toe and square topline for a knowing nod to this season's trends.

products.notes: The perfect ankle boots have arrived. With a mid-height block heel and softly square toe, this is the pair your wardrobe has been waiting for.

products.name: LIZZIE SUEDE COURT SHOES
products.notes: Every well-edited wardrobe should contain a classic pair of courts like these. Sitting on a wearable mid-height heel, the Lizzie courts are cut to a timelessly sleek silhouette with an almond-shaped toe. Crafted from premium suede, they feature leather soles with rubber inserts for grip and durability, while increased padding ensures all-day comfort.

products.name: HETTY LACE UP ANKLE BOOTS
products.notes: Drawing inspiration from this season's lace boot trend, the Hetty boots stylishly tread the line between comfort and effortless style.

products.name: CHELSEY BROGUES
products.notes: Sitting on a contemporary chunky sole, the Chelsey lace up shoes put a modern spin on the classic brogue.
